main event: Several UFO sightings reported in 1963, including multiple incidents in the United States and South America.
interesting points: A bright object was seen in Canton, Ohio by a local man for 3-4 minutes., A bright light observed by two boys in North Royalton, Ohio., Numerous observers in Arica, Chile reported a light blue-green object crossing the sky at high speed., A DC-4 passenger aircraft was followed by a UFO near Córdoba, Tucumán, Argentina., A large number of silvery particles were reported over Bahia Blanca, Argentina, found to be an amalgam of silicon, boron, calcium, and magnesium.
witness description: High school astronomers and local citizens
